headline: Wells Fargo Raises Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) Price Target, Sees M&A Potential
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. (NASDAQ:WBD) ranks among the best communication services stocks to buy now. Wells Fargo boosted its price target for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. (NASDAQ:WBD) to $14 from $13 on September 11, retaining an Equal Weight rating on the company’s shares. The revision reflects Wells Fargo’s belief that Warner Brothers Discovery’s Studios and […]
